alert.note: Alert for Cass; Johnson (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 1:02PM CDT until September 23 at 1:30PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Cass County in west central Missouri... Southwestern Johnson County in west central Missouri... * Until 130 PM CDT. * At 101 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Lynne, or 7 miles north of Garden City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pleasant Hill, Holden, Chilhowee, East Lynne, Kingsville, Centerview, Strasburg, Gunn City, La Tour and Quick City. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
